<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Graceful Guidance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2319) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 18 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can demonstrate how to quickly twist out of the way of dangerous effects. You can use the [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) reaction to grant a bonus to an ally's Reflex save. As usual for Aid, you need to prepare by using an action on your turn to encourage the ally.
name: Graceful Guidance
